original_text: When I arrived back in Jerusalem, I heard about the evil thing that Eliashib had done. He had given Tobiah a large room in the yards of God's temple.
korean_text: 예루살렘에 이르러서야 엘리아십이 도비야를 위하여 하나님의 전 뜰에 방을 만든 악한 일을 안지라

sentences.original_text: When I arrived back in Jerusalem
I heard about the evil thing
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 악한 일에 대해 들었다

sentences.original_text: He had given Tobiah a large room
in the yards of God's temple
